subject: Tennis
Sony Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Novak Djokovic benefited from an incorrect call in the pivotal game to beat Andy Murray, 7-5, 6-3, in the quarterfinals of the Sony Open in Key Biscayne, Fla.
snippet: Novak Djokovic benefited from an incorrect call in the pivotal game to beat Andy Murray, 7-5, 6-3, in the quarterfinals of the Sony Open in Key Biscayne, Fla.
